word:
What large possibilities are presented before us in the words spoken by Jesus! He says, "I have declared unto them Thy name, and will declare it, that the love wherewith Thou hast loved Me may be in them, and I in them." These words from the prayer of Christ are worthy of being written in letters 
                                                                           1028
of gold. They should be dwelt upon, and presented to the world by pen and voice.
